{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Yellow Shard |image = [[File:Yellow_Shard_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Yellow Shard''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Yellow Shard''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Yellow Shard can be used with [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} to obtain items from [[Shard Trader|Shard Traders]]. ==Mine Layout== The Yellow Shard appears in the Underground as a 4x3 sized object.

[[File:YellowShardMine.png|100px]] ==Trades== Yellow Shards can be used to purchase the following items: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! rowspan=2|Item !! colspan=2|Cost |- ! Shards !! Quest Points |- | [[File:Bag_Electric_Egg_Sprite.png|20px]] [[Electric Egg]] || 20 [[File:Yellow_Shard_Updated.png|20px]] Yellow Shards || 250 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[File:Thunder_Stone.png|20px]] [[Thunder Stone]] || 40 [[File:Yellow_Shard_Updated.png|20px]] Yellow Shards || 625 {{Questpoints}} |} They can also be used in combination with other [[Shards]] to purchase the following items: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! rowspan=2|Item !! colspan=2|Cost |- ! Shards !! Quest Points |- | [[File:Bag_Fighting_Egg_Sprite.png|20px]] [[Fighting Egg]] || 10 [[File:Yellow_Shard_Updated.png|20px]] Yellow Shards

500 [[File:Pink_Shard_Updated.png|20px]] [[Pink Shard|Pink Shards]] || 2,500 {{Questpoints}} |} For details as to where one can purchase these items, please check the [[Shard Trader]] page for more information. ==Acquisition== Yellow Shards can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Digletts Cave|Rare}} {{LootItem|Rock Tunnel|Rare}} {{LootItem|Rocket Game Corner|Rare}} {{LootItem|Power Plant|Rare}} {{LootItem|Berry Forest|Rare}} {{LootItem|Victory Road|Rare}} {{LootItem|Cerulean Cave|Rare}} {{LootItem|Sprout Tower|Rare}} {{LootItem|Union Cave|Rare}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Rare}} {{LootItem|Ice Path|Rare}} {{LootItem|Victory Road Johto|Rare}} {{LootItem|Mt Silver|Rare}} {{LootItem|Rusturf Tunnel|Rare}} {{LootItem|Granite Cave|Rare}} {{LootItem|New Mauville|Rare}} {{LootItem|Weather Institute|Rare}} {{LootItem|Magma Hideout|Rare}} {{LootItem|Sky Pillar|Rare}} {{LootItem|Victory Road Hoenn|Rare}} {{LootItem|Valley Windworks|Rare}} {{LootItem|Team Galactic Eterna Building|Rare}} {{LootItem|Mt.
